title: Hot Guys on an Island and in the Kitchen
itunes:title: Hot Guys on an Island and in the Kitchen
description:
The newest member of Su’s family is fluffy, hypoallergenic, and the cause of her own personal hell. Plus, she’s got solutions for all you thirsties out there. Finally, Ku shares her favorite TV shows of the summer (Carmy from Hulu’s new series has her “yes chef”-ing all season).

Please note, Add To Cart contains mature themes and may not be appropriate for all listeners. 

To see all products mentioned in this episode, head to @addtocartpod on Instagram. To purchase any of the products, see below. 

  • Su’s fancy zip code dog is from TinkerPups
  • In her new book “Quench,” Dr. Dana Cohen and Gina Bria describe the new science behind hydration
  • Add chia seeds to your everyday diet for max hydration. Su found hers at Thrive Market
  • Or keep some bone broth packets in your purse
  • Calpak backpacks make back-to-school season even more exciting 
  • Feast your eyes on this blue Stella McCartney tracksuit
  • Ku’s summer TV recs: The Summer I Turned Pretty, FBoy Island, and The Bear


Stay up to date with us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram at @LemonadaMedia. 


Joining Lemonada Premium is a great way to support our show and get bonus content. Subscribe today at bit.ly/lemonadapremium. 


Click this link for a list of current sponsors and discount codes for this show and all Lemonada shows: lemonadamedia.com/sponsors

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
